Chap. 13 - Sermon

                         A Chosen People 

                         Sermon by Ellen G. White at 
            Minneapolis, Minnesota, October 21, 1888 - Ms 17, 1888 


     "Ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvelous light. . . . Dearly beloved, I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshy lusts, which war against the soul; having your conversation honest among the Gentiles: that, whereas they speak against you as evildoers, they may by your good works, which they shall behold, glorify God in the day of visitation" (1 Peter 2:9-12).
